com.quantcomponents.algo.ta
Interface IPatternFinder<A extends Comparable<A>,O extends Comparable<O>>

Type Parameters:
A - type of the chart abscissa
O - type of the chart ordinate
public interface IPatternFinder<A extends Comparable<A>,O extends Comparable<O>>

Pattern finder interface. Implementors are used to extract meaninful patterns from a time series

Method Summary
 List<IPattern<A,O>> findPatterns()
          Find the patterns in the time series from scratch
 List<IPattern<A,O>> findPatterns(ISeriesPoint<A,O> addedPoint)
          Update the list of patterns based on the new point added.
 List<IPattern<A,O>> findPatterns(ISeriesPoint<A,O> oldPoint, ISeriesPoint<A,O> updatedPoint)
          Update the list of patterns based on a modified point.
 

Method Detail

findPatterns

List<IPattern<A,O>> findPatterns()
Find the patterns in the time series from scratch

Returns:
a list of patterns

findPatterns

List<IPattern<A,O>> findPatterns(ISeriesPoint<A,O> addedPoint)
Update the list of patterns based on the new point added. This method allows optimisations in the pattern search algorithm

Parameters:
addedPoint - the only point being added since the last pattern generation
Returns:
a list of pattern

findPatterns

List<IPattern<A,O>> findPatterns(ISeriesPoint<A,O> oldPoint,
                                 ISeriesPoint<A,O> updatedPoint)
Update the list of patterns based on a modified point. This method allows optimisations in the pattern search algorithm

Parameters:
oldPoint - the old point being modified since the last pattern generation
updatedPoint - the only point been modified since the last pattern generation
Returns:
a list of pattern
